titleStmt.title: Information for Lieutenant Collonel Forbes, and John Forbes writer in Edinburgh Agent for the late regiment of Sir John Hill at Fort-William, against Captain Allan Cathcart, Captain Menzies and Captain Hamiltoun.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: tightly bound with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
